data.message: Your lovely graphic omits to say that Coca-Cola bottles only contain a mere 7% of recycled plastic to ensure they remain clear and see through.  Please use 100% recycled plastic in your bottles and help reduce the detrimental impact the company has on the environment.  Below is one of many Coca-Cola bottles collected during a community clean-up near the River Avon. ☹️

replies.message: Hi Richard, we’re proud to say that all of our packaging in GB is 100% recyclable. For the last five years, we’ve been using 25% recycled plastic across all our brands, a figure we want to increase to 50% by 2020, but there’s not enough recycled plastic to go beyond that in Great Britain at the moment. This is why as part of our strategy we will be seeking reform of the recycling system in the UK to improve recovery and recycling rates. We are continually evolving our recycling strategy and investing in innovations to support our overall sustainability commitments. For more info please visit: http://spr.ly/61848A4ry
